ATTENTION: THE SOC USED IN YOUR TRANSACTION HAS NOT BEEN ASSIGNED BY THE SOCIAL SECURITY ADMINISTRATION. PLEASE CHECK FOR A DATA ENTRY ERROR.
**VERIFY BHN/LBC035380880; IT DOES NOT CONFORM TO BHN STANDARDS FOR 1973 AND LATER BOATS AS OUTLINED IN THE NCIC OPERATING MANUAL.

ncic:SexualOffenderRecord.nc:CaveatText: *** SEX OFFENDER REGISTRY INFORMATION *** THE SUBJECT IDENTIFIED IN THE FOLLOWING RECORD WITH NIC/X000000001 IS REGISTERED AS A SEX OFFENDER. DO NOT SEARCH, DETAIN, OR ARREST BASED SOLELY ON THIS RECORD. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION REGARDING SUBJECT MAY BE AVAILABLE FROM THE INTERSTATE IDENTIFICATION INDEX.
WARNING - THE FOLLOWING RECORD CONTAINS EXPIRED LICENSE PLATE DATA. USE CAUTION, CONTACT ENTERING AGENCY TO CONFIRM STATUS
RECORD NIC/NIC32001 IS BASED ON PARTIAL VIN SEARCH - VERIFY ALL DATA BEFORE TAKING FURTHER ACTION BASED ON THIS RESPONSE
RECORD NIC/NIC32001 IS BASED ON PARTIAL LIC SEARCH - VERIFY ALL DATA BEFORE TAKING FURTHER ACTION BASED ON THIS RESPONSE
REPEAT - DO NOT DETAIN BASED UPON NCIC RECORD WITH NIC/X012345678. FOREIGN SEX OFFENDER - IMMEDIATELY CONTACT INTERPOL, US DOJ, AT NLETS ORI/DCINTER00, OR TEL. NO. (202) 616-9000.
**TEST**THIS RESPONSE IS FROM NCIC TEST SYSTEM.
ncic:SexualOffenderRecord.nc:OrganizationDescriptionText: ORI IS BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION AND CUSTOMS ENFORCEMENT, LAW ENFORCEMENT SUPPORT CENTER 877 999-5372
